mapper.select: SELECT contentId, contentName, contentRegion, contentStartDate, contentEndDate, contentPrice, contentBoard FROM Content WHERE contentId = #{id}
SELECT contentId, contentName, contentRegion, contentStartDate, contentEndDate, contentPrice, contentBoard FROM Content ORDER BY contentId DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Content (contentName, contentRegion, contentStartDate, contentEndDate, contentPrice, contentBoard) VALUES (#{contentName}, #{contentRegion}, #{contentStartDate}, #{contentEndDate}, #{contentPrice}, #{contentBoard})
